subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Marathon Running
Running
lead_paragraph: The only way to know for sure that a marathon course is precisely 26 miles, 385 yards is to call upon official measurers, like David Cundy and his wife, Fran Seton.
snippet: The only way to know for sure that a marathon course is precisely 26 miles, 385 yards is to call upon official measurers, like David Cundy and his wife, Fran Seton.
